definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: But he is also under the gun from lawmakers over Bank Century.
sentences.chinese: 但是他也處於世紀銀行調查的槍口之下。

sentences.english: Scooping up the handgun, he bounded outside and held it to the foreman's head.
sentences.chinese: 他抓起手槍跳出車外，把槍口對準工頭的頭。

sentences.english: They both had large eyes, wide foreheads and tapering muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆的大眼睛，寬闊的前額和尖細槍口。

sentences.english: The GSD muzzle is straight in profile, with a predominantly black nose.
sentences.chinese: GSD槍口是平直的在外形，與一個主要地黑鼻子。

sentences.english: Bosses have their own issues and you might just be in the line of fire.
sentences.chinese: 老闆們都有自己的事情，而你可能正好撞到了槍口上。

sentences.english: Several muzzles at once aimed at the fleeing birds in the air.
sentences.chinese: 好幾支獵槍的槍口，同時瞄準了這些空中獵物。

sentences.english: The soldier depressed the muzzle of a gun.
The scout saw the flash of a gun and then heard the zip of a bullet.
sentences.chinese: 偵察兵看見槍口火光一閃，然後聽見子彈的尖嘯聲。

sentences.english: That day, he turned his gunpoint to himself.
sentences.chinese: 那一日他將槍口倒轉指向本身。

sentences.english: Have you ever smelled birds in the despair at gunpoint moan?
sentences.chinese: 您可曾聞到鳥兒在槍口下絕望的哀鳴？

sentences.english: In this research paper, he turns his guns on “sustainability”.
sentences.chinese: 這一研究論文裏，他將槍口瞄準了“可持續性”。

sentences.english: He re-aimed and shot a tree instead.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他移動槍口，把子彈射在一顆樹上。
